execution_plan.description: Retrieve all receipt numbers for customer with CustomerId = 15 from the receipts database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT ReceiptNumber FROM receipts WHERE CustomerId = 15;

execution_plan.description: Get distinct item names from the items table for the receipts returned by step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT Item FROM items WHERE Receipt IN ($step1.ReceiptNumber);
